import React,{useState}from"react";import{Grid}from"@mui/material";import{TimeIcon}from"@components/library";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{BIDS}from"@constants";import{useTranslation}from"@helpers/translate";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TimeMobile=()=>{const[open,setOpen]=useState(false);const dispatch=useDispatch();const{time}=useSelector(state=>state.bids);const{__}=useTranslation();const changeTime=value=>{dispatch({type:BIDS.UPDATE_FIELD,payload:{time:value}});setOpen(false);};const arrTime=[{value:"00:00:10",name:__("trading.10s"),minutes:0.166666667},// added minutes field
{value:"00:01:00",name:__("trading.1m"),minutes:1},{value:"00:03:00",name:__("trading.3m"),minutes:3},{value:"00:05:00",name:__("trading.5m"),minutes:5},{value:"00:10:00",name:__("trading.10m"),minutes:10},{value:"00:15:00",name:__("trading.15m"),minutes:15},{value:"00:30:00",name:__("trading.30m"),minutes:30},{value:"01:00:00",name:__("trading.1h"),minutes:60},{value:"04:00:00",name:__("trading.4h"),minutes:240}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"select-trade-mobile ".concat(open?"select-trade-mobile--focused":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"select-trade-mobile__content ".concat(open?"active":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"select-trade-mobile__bg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>setOpen(false),className:"select-trade-mobile__close"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"select-trade-mobile__content-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"select-trade-mobile__btns",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:"10px",children:arrTime.map(_ref=>{let{value,name}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"select-trade-mobile__btn ".concat(time===value?"active":""),onClick:()=>changeTime(value),children:name})},value);})})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setOpen(true),type:"button",className:"select-trade-mobile__open-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"select-trade-mobile__time",children:time}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimeIcon,{className:"select-trade-mobile__icon"})]})]});};export default TimeMobile;
